Literature.Title: Acyl-substituted dermaseptin S4 derivatives with improved bactericidal properties, including on oral microflora
Literature.Author: Porat Y, Marynka K, Tam A, Steinberg D, Mor A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=2±1µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=9±3µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=1.5µM)
